sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
        <v-row class="px-3">
            <v-col v-for="card in cards" :key="card" cols="8">
                <v-card class="overflow-auto" height="350px">
                    <v-list lines="two">
                        <v-list-subheader>경력 리스트</v-list-subheader>
                        <template v-for="(item,i) in careerItems" :key="i">
                            <v-list-item>
                                <template v-slot:prepend>
                                    <v-avatar>
                                        <v-img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/219/219986.png"></v-img>
                                    </v-avatar>
                                </template>
                                <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
                                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ item.job }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                            </v-list-item>
                            <v-divider v-if="i !== 4" :key="`divider-${i}`" inset></v-divider>
                        </template>
                    </v-list>
                    <v-list lines="two">
                        <v-list-subheader>학력 리스트</v-list-subheader>
                        <template v-for="(item,i) in educationItems" :key="i">
                            <v-list-item>
                                <template v-slot:prepend>
                                    <v-avatar>
                                        <v-img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/219/219986.png"></v-img>
                                    </v-avatar>
                                </template>
                                <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
                                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ item.job }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                            </v-list-item>
                            <v-divider v-if="i !== 4" :key="`divider-${i}`" inset></v-divider>
                        </template>
                    </v-list>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>

            <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">
                    <!--  -->
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>

            <v-col cols="12" sm="12">
                <v-sheet rounded="lg" min-height="350">
                    <!--  -->
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-row>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data: () => ({
        cards: ['경력 리스트'],
        careerItems: [
            { title: '제이브로 컴퍼니', job: '웹 퍼블리셔' },
            { title: '씽크블락', job: '웹 퍼블리셔 / 일본어(번역)' },
            { title: '도톤 플라자(Doton Plaza)', job: '일본어(통역,번역)' },
            { title: '돈키호테(Don Quijote)', job: '일본어(통역,번역)' },
            { title: '친절한 형제들', job: '레크레이션 강사' },
        ],
        educationItems: [
            { title: '그린아카데미', job: 'UI/UX 디자인 및 웹개발' },
            { title: 'YBM평생교육', job: '영어영문학' },
            { title: '메릭일본어학교', job: '일문학' },
            { title: '목포대학교', job: '간호학과' },
            { title: '광주자연과학고등학교', job: '식물학과' },                      
        ]
    }),
}
</script>
